title: WL Martin Plan 24029
summary: Classic builder spec with four bedrooms, functional layout, and proven market appeal.
description: Plan 24029 represents WL Martin's builder-tested approach to residential design. This two-story plan provides four bedrooms and 2.5 baths in a layout that's been refined through countless builds. The open main level supports modern family life while upstairs bedrooms offer quiet private spaces. Construction-friendly details ensure predictable timelines and budgets.
